title: Shaded Screen
body:
It is becoming a recurring issue now. I keep getting a shaded screen during champ select that makes me unable to access the client. The only option i have is to run whatever my previous mastery/summoner spells with a champion if i am lucky enough to click one before i get shaded. This, if dodged, is giving me time penalties. Does this have something to do with the changeover to a new champ select or is the client just doing so because it knows that it is being replaced.

Thanks,

CamOFlage

replies.body:
something is wrong with the update.     
i'm having the same issue windows 10.

I'm using windows 10 but I have heard others from windows 7 and 8 having the same problem.
